trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration settings of a language provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示语言提供程序的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the configured <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 获取已配置的类型<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref>实现。

trans-unit.source: The machine configuration file contains the fully qualified type name for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 计算机配置文件包含每个的完全限定的类型名称<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>计算机上的实现。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: The CodeDomProviderType property value is a <xref:System.Type> instance that represents a configured language provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: CodeDomProviderType 属性值是<xref:System.Type>表示已配置的语言提供程序实现的实例。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref:System.Type> instance that represents the configured language provider type.
trans-unit.target: 只读<xref:System.Type>表示已配置的语言提供程序类型的实例。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The language provider is not configured on this computer.
trans-unit.target: 在此计算机上未配置语言提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Cannot locate the type because it is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty string.
trans-unit.target: 找不到类型，因为它是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or- Cannot locate the type because the name for the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> cannot be found in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: -或-找不到类型，因为名称<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref>找不到配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configured compiler settings for the language provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 获取语言提供程序实现的配置的编译器设置。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> instance that contains the compiler options and settings configured for the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 只读<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref>实例，其中包含的编译器选项和设置为语言提供程序配置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> instance for the current language provider settings.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref>当前语言提供程序设置的实例。

trans-unit.source: The CreateProvider method returns a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> instance for the current language provider settings.
trans-unit.target: CreateProvider 方法返回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>当前语言提供程序设置的实例。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the CreateProvider method to get a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CreateProvider 方法来获取<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>实现<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>返回实例<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM provider associated with the language provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: 与语言提供程序配置关联 CodeDOM 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> instance for the current language provider settings and specified options.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref>实例的当前语言提供程序设置和指定的选项。

trans-unit.source: The CreateProvider method returns a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> instance for the current language provider settings and the specified provider options.
trans-unit.target: CreateProvider 方法返回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>实例有关的当前语言提供程序设置和指定的提供程序选项。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: For information about supported provider options, see the specific CodeDOM provider documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关受支持的提供程序选项的信息，请参阅特定 CodeDOM 提供程序文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the CreateProvider method to get a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CreateProvider 方法来获取<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>实现<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>返回实例<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: A collection of provider options from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 从配置文件的提供程序选项的集合。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM provider associated with the language provider configuration and specified options.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 提供程序与语言提供程序配置关联，并指定选项。

trans-unit.source: providerOptions is .
trans-unit.target: providerOptions is .

trans-unit.source: The provider does not support options.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序不支持选项。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same language provider and compiler settings as the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否表示与当前的相同语言提供程序和编译器设置<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The two instances are considered equal if the values of the following properties are equal: - The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 两个实例被视为相等的以下属性值是否相等:-<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>属性。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A> properties of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A>， <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A>，和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A>属性<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters>返回实例<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A>方法。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前比较的对象<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if o is a object and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 是对象，其值是与此实例相同; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file name extensions supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 返回的文件名称扩展支持的语言提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The [\<system.codedom\> Element](../Topic/%3Csystem.codedom%3E%20Element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ \≪system.codedom\>元素](../Topic/%3Csystem.codedom%3E%20Element.md)计算机配置文件包含每个语言提供程序和编译器配置设置<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>计算机上的实现。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: Each configured language provider supports one or more file name extensions.
trans-unit.target: 每个已配置的语言提供程序支持一个或多个文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName> might support the file name extensions ".cs" and ".c#".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName>可能支持的文件名称扩展".cs"和".c #"。</xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of file name extensions supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 语言提供程序支持的文件扩展名的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将生成两个对象是否相等根据相同的哈希代码<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.Equals%2A>方法。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"></xref> instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo"></xref>实例，适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the language names supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取语言提供程序支持的语言名称。

trans-unit.source: The [\<system.codedom\> Element](../Topic/%3Csystem.codedom%3E%20Element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ \≪system.codedom\>元素](../Topic/%3Csystem.codedom%3E%20Element.md)计算机配置文件包含每个语言提供程序和编译器配置设置<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>计算机上的实现。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: Each configured language provider supports one or more language names.
trans-unit.target: 每个已配置的语言提供程序支持一个或多个语言名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> object for a <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName> might return an array with the language names "c#", "cs", and "csharp".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>对象<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName>可能会返回与语言名称"c#"、"cs"和"csharp"数组。</xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>

trans-unit.source: An array of language names supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 语言提供程序支持的语言名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the language provider implementation is configured on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否在计算机上配置语言提供程序实现。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid property to check the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation before accessing the provider properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid 属性来检查<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>之前访问的提供程序属性或方法的实现。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>

trans-unit.source: For example, after you get the language provider settings from the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A> method, use the IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid property to verify the provider type implementation before calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A> method or using the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，之后你获取语言提供程序设置从<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>方法，IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid 属性用于验证之前调用的提供程序类型实现<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A>方法或使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>属性。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the language provider implementation type is configured on the computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在计算机; 上配置语言提供程序实现类型否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
